title: Bug 128359: Incorrect logic when adding a filter to the table on the layout
description: We assume that the dataset has 10 records (DataResultA).
OB: Currently, when a filter (FilterB) is added to the table on the layout, the result of FilterB is based on DataResultA.
EB: The expected behavior is that the result of FilterB should be based on DataResultB.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Drag the dataset to the layout.
2. Set another filter (FilterB) on the table. 
3. Observe that the result of FilterB is based on DataResultA instead of DataResultB.
